text:
Introduction:
 Mich'mich is a sheep shaped plush living his perfect life, loved, and taken care of by his Human.
 Unfortunately, one very sad day, Mich'mich fell from his Human bag! What a pity...
Help Mich'mich on his quest to find back his beloved companion.

			Rules:
You will face different situations during the journey to save this lovely plush. The choice is yours to write down what will happen. But be aware that every decision has a consequence.
If Mich'mich undergoes to much degradation, you lose and Mich'mich will go to the heaven of plush. If you meet again Mich'mich human, you win.
